amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate $19.1 billion in funding for the bilateral economic assistance and independent agency programs within the Department of State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 89 printed in Part A of House Report 116-109 to eliminate $19.1 billion in funding for the bilateral economic assistance and independent agency programs within the Department of State.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walker amendment (A086) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 315 (Roll no. 335).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Walker amendment (A086) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 315 (Roll no. 335).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A086) offered by Mr. Walker.
